phrase.text: How far is the train station?
Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the post office?
When does the next tour start?
Is the museum open on Saturdays?
Can you take a photo of me?
The next bus stop is at the end of the street.
We are going to meet at 6 o'clock in the town square.
Let's go to the city centre.
The zoo is next to the police station.
Can we get there by foot?
What would you recommend to see in the first place?
How much is the admission fee?
Do you have any free maps of the city?
Would you like to visit National Gallery?
Our final destination today will be a local distillery.
You must visit the old castle.
Take the second exit at the roundabout. Continue straight ahead for about a mile. The museum will be on your right.

London is a capital of England. It is a diverse and exciting city with many attractions. The most visited tourist attractions are London Eye, the National Gallery and Tower of London. Also Buckingham Palace situated is in the city centre is a popular sight as it is the official residence of the British Queen. Every day in front of the palace Changing the Guard ceremony takes place. This is worth seeing while you are visiting London and it is usually witnessed by large crowds.

Welcome to Rome! Why don't you join us for a “hop on, hop off” sightseeing tour of the city... The buses leave every 15 minutes from the train station and stop at 10 different city attractions. You can get off the bus at any stop and enjoy your time in the local area for as long as you want. For more information come and ask tourist information office just next to the main train station entrance.
Last year we went for a weekend break to Edinburgh. We spent most of the trip sightseeing. We have visited the castle and the old town.

The gallery is open Monday-Friday from 10 am until 5 pm. Entrance fee is 10$ for adults and 5$ for children under 12 years of age. Photographing is strictly prohibited in the whole building and all cameras must be left in the cloakroom.
I have one younger brother and two sisters.
My parents got divorced two years ago.
My sister-in-law just got pregnant and she is expecting a babe.
My family lives in New York.
We have been married for 10 years and we have two children.
George is Robert's and Susan's father.
Anne is the youngest child in our family.
Carol and Michael are Robert's grandparents.
The modern nuclear family consists of dad the breadwinner, mum the housewife and several children.
Are your parents separated or they still live together?
Our family is very big. I have two brothers and three sisters. We also have twenty-one cousins: fourteen from my father's side of the family and seven from my mother's side.

Julia and Holy are twins and they look exactly the same. They have been brought up together and since they were kids their mother tried to dress them identically. There are many pictures in the family album where the girls are indistinguishable.
My family is a rather small one, with only three people, my father, my mother and me. My mother is a doctor and my father is a lawyer.
My parents got divorced a year ago. After the divorce my mother married a Canadian engineer and moved to Toronto. My father stayed in Washington and I decided to live with him.
I play tennis twice a week.
Last night we went to a live basketball game.
My grandfather was university boxing champion.
The Philadelphia Marathon is a popular athletic event.
Some people consider martial arts to be dangerous.
Do you like watching football on TV?
People often take up swimming to improve their fitness.
Darts is a popular pub game.
Do you think this team will go to the finals?
Chess is a sport that requires skills and intelligence.
Basketball is a team sport that was invented in USA.
Many families take their children and go ice skating in the evenings.
Baseball is very popular in United States.
He did not pass the ball to the other player.
Today we are going to win.
This is the best football magazine.
Paula's father reads sports news everyday.
My father goes jogging every day. He is very fit.
I like to play sports. My favourite is badminton.
Ian Thorpe is a famous Australian swimmer. He has won three gold medals in Sydney Summer Olympic Games.
I have been thinking about exchanging our tennis tickets. Instead of going on Friday, we should go on Saturday. What do you think?
In football game there are two teams playing. Each team consist of ten field players and a goalie.
Polish and Check are Slavic languages.
I can speak Spanish, German and a bit of Italian.
Haggis is a Scottish national dish.
There are three colours on German flag: red, black and yellow.
What is a traditional Indian dish?
I was born in a small village in Salvador.
Italian dialect from south is very different from any other dialects spoken in the country.
Los Angeles has a large amount of ethnic and cultural diversity.
Eating turkey on Christmas Day in Australia is a tradition.
Russia is the largest country in the world.
Greece borders with Albania, Republic of Macedonia, Bulgaria and Turkey.
Switzerland has four official languages. They speak Italian, French, German and Romansh.
I have double nationality. I am a French citizen and I also have a British passport.
Egypt is a country in north Africa. Its capital is Cairo and it has a population of over 90 million people.
I come from Spain and I was born in Barcelona. When I was four years old my family emigrated to USA and we stayed there until now. I can speak both Spanish and English.
It look like it is going to be windy tomorrow.
Let’s hope the weather holds out.
Yesterday it was hot and humid.
A lot of the crops dried up because of the drought.
I can feel the warm sunshine on my arms.
You get better weather on the east cost.
Last night we saw a beautiful sunset.
A desert is a landscape form or region that receives very little precipitation.
The bad weather spoiled our plans for the weekend.
In savanna climate we can distinguish to main seasons: wet and dry.
The alpine area has in general a much harsher climate than the rest of the country.
We had a drought in our area last summer. It did not rain for two months.
It is usually cold in winter. The temperatures are often below zero.
Tropical rainforests are found close to the equator. These areas are characterized by high humidity and heavy rains.
It is pretty warm. What is the temperature?
Summers are warm with occasional showers and cool nights. Winter temperatures range between 2°C and 5°C.
My birthday is on the 22nd of November.
I work through all week except Saturdays and Sundays.
1st of October is Chinese National Day.
A millennium is a period of one thousand years.
My training period is from April 15 to May 11.
Most people in France go on holiday in July.
I am going to a party next Friday.
We land at 5.30 pm local time.
Easter is a movable feast. Last year Easter Sunday was in first week of April.
4th of July is an important date in American history. On this day in 1776 America declared independence from Great Britain. After this it became a national holiday.
Christopher Columbus was born on 31 October 1451. He become famous for discovering America. He died in 1506 at the age of 54.
The meeting is going to be at 1 pm. It is going to last for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
We are going to depart at 6 o'clock. Please arrive at least 15 minutes earlier.
This red dress suits you well.
It is just a bit too tight.
What are you going to wear tonight?
Why don't you try it on?
You cannot wear trainers with a suit.
I like it but I think I need a slightly smaller size.
Where do you have changing rooms?
I need to buy a new winter jacket.
Did you wash my white summer dress?
You need to wear long sleeve shirt.
He is wearing a red T-shirt and black trousers today.
He bought her a gold ring.
This mini skirt is a bit too short.
Take a hat and sunglasses. It is very sunny.
She prefers casual clothes. She usually wears blue jeans and a sweater to class.
Did you see Jim's new coat? It is very fashionable.
She is so stylish! She must read all the fashion magazines.
I hate wearing high-heel shoes. They are always so uncomfortable.
We are going to the cinema tomorrow.
Have you seen the latest Harry Potter movie?
Argo is a 2012 historical drama thriller film directed by Ben Affleck.
This movie is based on the novel.
Steven Spielberg is a famous director.
I read three or four books every month.
Shakira is a Colombian pop singer.
We have seen a magician show last week.
Nowadays most towns have multiplex cinemas.
In theatres you can see plays, musicals or pantomimes.
Many people go to their local pub where they can play darts or pool.
Jennifer Aniston is a Hollywood actress.
At the weekend, younger people often go to a local disco.
There will be a concert of folk music at the town square.
Do you like going to the theatre?
This play got very good reviews.
What row do you like to sit in?
I will ll try to find good seats for tonight show.
The circus brings the best magicians and clowns.
They specialize in making fun of the audience.
I'm exhausted. I'm going to stay at home and watch a movie.
This book is about police investigator. I really recommend it if you like crime stories.
Each year Rio de Janeiro hosts the biggest carnival in the world. The tradition dates back to 1823.
This movie has won three Oscars last year. It is an absolute must see.
I have a appointment with a nurse tomorrow.
I have got a pain in my back.
It is prescription for the chemist.
I am having difficulty with breathing.
You need to loose some weight.
Take three of these pills a day.
A nurse needs to take your blood sample.
Are you on any sort of medication?
I am going to prescribe you some strong antibiotics.
My temperature is a little bit high.
Does it hurt when I press here?
Do you have any doctors who speak English?
We are going to put a plaster on you knee.
There is a possibility you might be pregnant.
I do not fell very well. I think I need to see a doctor.
I have been feeling depressed and I have been having difficulty sleeping. Could you give me an appointment with a specialist within next few days?
Are there any side effects of this medicine? I also forgot to mention that I am allergic to penicillin.
There are several patients in the lobby waiting for medical exams. Hopefully the doctor will be able to see you in about an hour.
After asking a few questions, the doctor's diagnosis was that I had a bacterial infection. She wrote me out a prescription.
My grandmother suggested that I need to eat chicken soup. I will try this tomorrow and if it does not help I will see a specialist.
